flawed_nl_solution:
Tory sold 12 packs + 7 packs = <<12+7=16>>16 packs to his family members.
Tory sold 16 packs + 5 packs = <<16+5=21>>21 packs in total
He has to sell 50 packs - 21 packs = <<50-21=29>>29 more packs of cookies to reach his target
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
